var data = JSON.parse(result);
var html = data.html;
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var list = doc.select('ul.novel-list li.novel-item');
if (list == null || list.size() == 0) list = doc.select('li.novel-item');
java.log('NovelFire search found ' + list.size() + ' results');
var ArrayList = java.util.ArrayList;
var resultList = new ArrayList();
for (var i = 0; i < list.size(); i++) {
  resultList.add(list.get(i));
}
resultList;
</js>
